mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart ( m_num, c_num, p_num, p_name, c_buy, p_price, c_total ) VALUES ( #{mNum}, CART_S.NEXTVAL, #{pNum}, #{pName}, #{cBuy}, #{pPrice}, #{cTotal} )
mapper.select: SELECT m_num AS mNum, c_num AS cNum, p_num AS pNum, p_name AS pName, c_buy AS cBuy, p_price AS pPrice, c_total AS cTotal FROM cart WHERE m_num = #{mNum}
